ComicInfo.Title: The Hole
ComicInfo.Summary:
The hot new series that redefines the horror genre continues
After closing the Borden theater for the evening, two young employees decide to have some late night fun. Little do they know they are not alone. Elsewhere, a broken, middle-aged man finds a hole in the ceiling that leads to a dimension not of this world. Featuring over 30 pages of content!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Nei Ruffino | 1 | B | Cover B | Daniel Leister & Blond | 2 | RE | Zenescope Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Alé Garza & Ivan Nunes | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-02 18:22:42. [CVDB306796]
